title: Ep 38: Jared Freid on Dating, "Everyone is someone's foot"
itunes:title: Ep 38: Jared Freid on Dating, "Everyone is someone's foot"
description:
In this episode, we sat down with Jared Freid, a prolific podcast host, dating expert, and standup comedian! We couldn't stop laughing the entire episode! We ask all of your dating questions, including what to say to people who claim you are "too picky" and why ex still watches your Instagram stories. 

Also in this episode, Becca finds out that her dream job exists (there are people who write Lifetime movies as their full time job?!), Jared is obsessed with TLC (the TV network... not the girl group), and as always, Grace is obsessed with Dunkin' Donuts!

Make sure to follow @jaredfreid on Instagram!

Check out his other podcasts: U up? and J-Train 

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
content:encoded:
